truth: -  "The Pacific Ocean is the largest and deepest of Earth's oceanic divisions."
fiction: -  "The Pacific Ocean is a vast, shallow puddle created by a giant's footstep."

truth: -  "The Grand Canyon, located in Arizona, USA, is a steep-sided canyon carved by the Colorado River."
fiction: -  "The Grand Canyon, located in Arizona, USA, is a massive sinkhole caused by a meteor impact."

truth: -  "The Great Barrier Reef, off the coast of Queensland, Australia, is the world's largest coral reef system."
fiction: -  "The Great Barrier Reef, off the coast of Queensland, Australia, is the world's largest underwater city inhabited by mermaids."

truth: -  "The Nile River, flowing through northeastern Africa, is the longest river in the world."
fiction: -  "The Nile River, flowing through northeastern Africa, is the world's longest waterslide."

truth: -  "The Andes, running through seven South American countries, is the longest continental mountain range in the world."
fiction: -  "The Andes, running through seven South American countries, is the world's longest dragon's spine."

truth: -  "The Mariana Trench, located in the western Pacific Ocean, is the deepest part of the world's oceans."
fiction: -  "The Mariana Trench, located in the western Pacific Ocean, is the world's deepest trench dug by ancient sea monsters."

truth: -  "The Sahara Desert, covering large parts of North Africa, is the world's largest hot desert."
fiction: -  "The Sahara Desert, covering large parts of North Africa, is the world's largest sandbox."

truth: -  "The Amazon Rainforest, located in South America, is the world's largest tropical rainforest."
fiction: -  "The Amazon Rainforest, located in South America, is the world's largest outdoor botanical garden."

truth: -  "The Dead Sea, bordered by Jordan to the east and Israel and Palestine to the west, is one of the world's saltiest bodies of water."
fiction: -  "The Dead Sea, bordered by Jordan to the east and Israel and Palestine to the west, is a sea filled with zombie fish."

truth: -  "The Himalayas, stretching across five countries in Asia, is the world's highest mountain range."
fiction: -  "The Himalayas, stretching across five countries in Asia, is the world's tallest wall built by ancient giants."

truth: -  "Antarctica, located in the southern hemisphere, is the coldest, driest, and windiest continent."
fiction: -  "Antarctica, located in the southern hemisphere, is a giant ice cream factory."

truth: -  "The Mississippi River, flowing through the United States, is the second-longest river in North America."
fiction: -  "The Mississippi River, flowing through the United States, is a giant snake slithering across the continent."

truth: -  "The Gobi Desert, located in northern China and southern Mongolia, is a vast, arid region in Asia."
fiction: -  "The Gobi Desert, located in northern China and southern Mongolia, is a massive beach without an ocean."

truth: -  "The Great Lakes, located in North America, form the largest group of freshwater lakes on Earth by total area."
fiction: -  "The Great Lakes, located in North America, are giant bowls of soup made by Paul Bunyan."

truth: -  "The Rocky Mountains, stretching from the northernmost part of British Columbia, in western Canada, to New Mexico, in the Southwestern United States, is a major mountain range in western North America."
fiction: -  "The Rocky Mountains, stretching from the northernmost part of British Columbia, in western Canada, to New Mexico, in the Southwestern United States, are a pile of rocks dumped by a giant."
